name: Atlas Software
tagline: A Name that stands for Assurance, Solution & Trust
description:
ATLAS SOFTWARE is a diversified offshore IT solutions company offering world-class application services to help your organization exceed its technological expectations. Our competencies lie in onshore and offshore software development, maintenance and offshore project management services.

Since its inception (1995 ) the company has been in the outsourcing industry, servicing clients thousands of miles away, maturing into a core dependable extension of a client’s internal team. Atlas has consistently provided highly personalized service to its clients. Atlas works with each customer to ensure that we provide the optimal multidisciplinary team of management and technology professionals. Atlas takes a unique approach to providing the highest quality of service to our clients which has allowed us to establish long-term relationships with our clients.
 
We deliver business value – beyond mere offshore advantages, lowered costs and faster turnaround times. We align technology with business needs to empower an enterprise with seamlessly integrated, robust and scalable technology solutions. AtlasSoft offers an impressive range of services at competitive prices, as well as ready to integrate powerful and easy-to-use products. Our approach to website development supposes database driven, scalable and usability solutions. We are available for a variety of projects with different complexity and will customize these products for your specific website.
